about_the_game:
Join the Crusade

Play with up to 4 players local or online, in Blood for The Old Gods. A flintlock fantasy rogue-lite where you shoot, summon, and survive your way across the war torn countryside, once quaint villages, and sprawling industrial towns culminating in the final showdown against the New Gods.

"Friendly" Hellfire

Your faith may shield your mind, but teamwork will keep you alive. Armed with weapons fused together with technology and magic, with full friendly fire the scourge of the New Gods aren't the only thing that can kill you.

Become the Ultimate Acolytes

Between runs players will upgrade and unlock new Weapons, Summons, Blessings & Perks from the relative safety of their operations base… The Pub. You either survive together or die together for the cause. The true faithful will walk the path to victory.

Harness the Power of the Gods

Armed with an arsenal of godly abilities, choose your summons to unleash wrath and vengeance to cleanse the lands of these false idols and their followers. The corrupted minds and bodies of the New Gods cult will stop at nothing to keep power and control.
